main.name: Administration
main.explain: ...managing a (big) task, usually involves paperwork and sorting things out.

main.name: Analyse
main.explain: ...examining methodically by separating into parts and studying their interrelations.

main.name: Artistic
main.explain: ...showing imagination and skill in the arts. You are sensitive to arts or appreciate art.

main.name: Communicate
main.explain: ...carrying the message across effectively. Explaining anything with ease.

main.name: Computers
main.explain: You find it easy to learn how to use new computer programs and are not afraid of trying out new technology.

main.name: Control
main.explain: ...taking control of any situation. In other words, you easily manage any situation.

main.name: Counselling
main.explain: ...giving and taking advice. You like to offer advice or guidance.

main.name: Creative
main.explain: ...being imaginative. You have the ability or power to create. You are characterized by originality and expressiveness.

main.name: Decision making
main.explain: ...making decisions easily and stick to it.

main.name: Empathy
main.explain: ...identifying with and understanding another person’s situation, feelings and motives.

main.name: Entertaining
main.explain: ...To hold the attention of with something amusing or diverting.

main.name: Handwork
main.explain: ...doing things with your hands, building things, creating, being creative.

main.name: Marketing
main.explain: …portraying ideas in such a matter to others so that they are persuaded to ‘buy what you are selling’. You are good at convincing people

main.name: Negotiate
main.explain: ...conferring with others in order to come to terms or reach an agreement.

main.name: Numeracy
main.explain: ...expressing yourself effectively in quantitative terms. You also like working with numbers, and maths.

main.name: Objectivity
main.explain: ...seeing a situation from an external the point of view even if you are not an outsider, you won’t let your emotions or beliefs influence your perception of a situation.

main.name: Organize
main.explain: ...putting things together into an orderly, functional, structured whole.

main.name: Planning
main.explain: ...formulating a scheme or program for the accomplishment a goal. You like to have something as a specific aim or purpose.

main.name: Playing music instrument
main.explain: You have the ability to use a musical instrument to its full potential, have the talent of making music.

main.name: Practical
main.explain: ...doing things in a practical, executable manner. You like finding the easiest, cheapest and most effective way of doing things.

main.name: Public speaking
main.explain: ...speaking in front of people, you like entertaining, motivating, teaching and inspiring any group of people.

main.name: Reading
main.explain: ...collecting information by reading, you like to read about things that interest you. You love to spend time in the library or on the Internet doing research or reading up on something.

main.name: Receptive for people
main.explain: understanding other people’s needs. You are sensitive to their emotions and they feel welcome in your company.

main.name: Sharing
main.explain: You like to make your resources available to other people to use to their advantage.

main.name: Sport
main.explain: ...mostly physical activities you take on. You probably have a good ball sense and love to be active.

main.name: Strategic planning
main.explain: ...preparing for something specific focusing on the bigger picture taking into account the small things that needs to be done to achieve the bigger picture.

main.name: Study
main.explain: You like to learn about something and usually remember it very well.

main.name: Taking the lead
main.explain: ...taking hold of a situation and people find it natural to follow your lead.

main.name: Teaching
main.explain: To provide knowledge; instruct in.

main.name: Writing
main.explain: ...expressing yourself in writing. You’d rather write than speak.
